block.p: A music listing in the Arts & Leisure section on Sunday for the Music Festival of the Hamptons included artists from last year instead of those scheduled to perform this week. This is a corrected listing:

The soprano Angelina Reaux tomorrow at 8 p.m. The Atlantic Chamber Orchestra, conducted by Michael Guttman, on Friday at 8 p.m. Chamber music by Arnold Steinhardt and family on Saturday at 5 p.m. An all-Copland tribute concert with the Atlantic Chamber Orchestra, conducted by Lukas Foss, on Saturday at 8 p.m.

A music listing in the Arts & Leisure section on Sunday for the Music Festival of the Hamptons included artists from last year instead of those scheduled to perform this week. This is a corrected listing:
